name: THE GANG
description:
Using the technique of hand needle felting we create these playful dolls filled with personality and will quickly find a place in your child's heart and even in yours..

Materials: 
Body: Up-cycled wool. 
Eyes and Mouth: Ultra-Fine 100% Felted Wool. 
Fill: Premium Fiberfill, pure white fiber hypo-allergenic.

APROX 14" TALL

* Made to order, please allow 3-5 business days to complete your order.
* These handmade dolls are beautifully felted and may be more suitable for 3+ years old.

Handmade in Brooklyn, NY

name: Mostrito
description:
Our new line of Mostritos, super soft and cuddly, perfect to welcome the little ones to the world.

Made from quality up-cycled cashmere sweaters.

Materials:
Up-cycled cashmere sweaters.
Fill: Premium Fiberfill, pure white fiber hypo-allergenic.

14" tall

Price is for one item.

* Please note that since each Snuggly Ugly is unique, your doll will be very similar but not identical like the one shown on the picture.
* Colors will be very similar but not identical to the photo.

Handmade in Brooklyn, NY

Please chose which color combination preference for your Mostrito.

The front part of the pillow features an appliqued with eyes open and the back side with the eyes close.

name: Rag Doll's Wooden Clothes Rack with 3 hangers
description:
Organize the Rag doll's adorable outfits in this sweet wooden clothes rack. 

The rack is 10" tall and about 10.5" wide.  
It comes with 3 wooden hangers (3" aprox)

Suitable for children aged 3 years+, requires some self assembly.

description:

Fill: premium fiberfill, pure white fiber hypo-allergenic.
Dimensions: aprox. 8 x 8

name: Limited Edition rag dolls.
description:
Limited edition handmade dolls, made from quality up-cycled cashmere & wool sweaters.
Each doll is handmade with attention to detail, hand stitched face and wears a one-of-a-kind stylish dress.

Materials:
Body: 100 % linen/cotton.
Hair & Clothing: Up-cycled cashmere & wool sweaters
Premium fiberfill, pure white fiber hypo-allergenic.

15" tall approximately.

 * Because we work with up-cycled sweaters each doll has an unique color tone combination. Colors will be very similar but not identical to the photo.

* These handmade dolls are beautifully made and may be more suitable for 3+ years old.

Handmade in Brooklyn, NY

name: Snuggly Ugly + kallio NYC - Collaboration
description:
Snuggly Ugly Rag Dolls wearing exclusive Kallio costumes.

About Kallio NYC: 
Kallio takes care of pre loved men’s shirts. They collect them, sort them and give them new life, nothing is wasted. 
Kallio Nyc is a conscious kid's brand that is fun, stylish and unexpected, that kids can play hard in, with out being hard on the environment"

Kallio is designed by the amazingly talented Karina Kallio. 


Materials:
Clothing: Crafted using the cotton fabrics of the kids clothing line Kallio Nyc.
Accessories: leather bag
Body: 100 % linen/cotton.
Hair, legs and arms: cashmere/wool.
Premium fiberfill, pure white fiber hypo-allergenic.
14" tall.

* Because we work with up-cycled fabrics each doll has an unique color tone combination. Colors will be very similar but not identical to the photo.
* Each doll is handmade with attention to detail and hand stitched face and hair.
* These handmade dolls are beautifully made and may be more suitable for 3+ years old.

Handmade in Brooklyn, NY

name: Snuggly Tooth Fairy Cashmere Pillowcase
description:
on sale -  was $58

The perfect soft furnishings for the children’s room.
The front part of the pillowcase features an appliqued with a Snuggly Ugly monster face and one pocket for the tooth-to-cash exchange, we also know that kids love to hide little things.  It is like a secret place for kids.


Made to order, please allow 5 business days to complete your order.

The back part of the pillowcase with 100% cotton and envelope closure
Size: Aprox. (14" x 14")
Fits a standard pillow 14" x 14" 
The pillow insert seen sell separately.

* Because we work with up-cycled sweaters each pillow has an unique color tone combination. Colors will be very similar but not identical to the photo.

A note on care: these can be hand washed in cool water (air dry flat) or dry cleaned if the occasion requires.

Handmade in Brooklyn, NY
